trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGISB5MATSYA_00849_MATSYA_000_000<tab>The skies, they...they no longer burn. I know not how, but the calamity that befell us has been averted.
TEXT_REGISB5MATSYA_00849_MATSYA_000_001<tab>It will take time for us to rebuild, and even then, life may never return to what it once was. So much has been lost...
TEXT_REGISB5MATSYA_00849_MATSYA_000_002<tab>But our hardships only make us stronger. That we yet live is a gift, and I will not see it squandered.
TEXT_REGISB5MATSYA_00849_MATSYA_000_010<tab>I am glad we were able to help you out, if only in a small way. Please, let me know should you wish to borrow the boat again!
TEXT_REGISB5MATSYA_00849_MATSYA_000_020<tab>Wh-What was that strange light out on the waters? Do you think we should call back our boats?
TEXT_REGISB5MATSYA_00849_MATSYA_000_030<tab>Sisters be praised! The ocean waters are calm and quiet once more. We would do well not to squander this good fortune.

TEXT_REGISB5MATSYA_00849_MATSYA_000_100<tab>The prospect of having you by my side on the journey to Aloalo does quell my fears somewhat. In fact, imagining what fish I might catch for Nidhana has me rather excited!

TEXT_REGISB5MATSYA_00849_MATSYA_000_110<tab>Thank you for everything you've done, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Both Pasasun and I have been so busy with rebuilding after the Final Days that we've thought of little else. It was nice to have a relaxed conversation for once.
TEXT_REGISB5MATSYA_00849_MATSYA_000_111<tab>I suppose I never told you about Pasasun and I. We've been friends since childhood, you see. Back then we were inseparable.

TEXT_REGISB5MATSYA_00849_MATSYA_000_112<tab>Clumsy me was always getting scrapes and bruises, and Pasasun wanted to become an alchemist so he could learn to heal them. He's ever had a kind heart, so don't hesitate to turn to him in times of need!
